mapper.insert: insert into freeboard(bno, title, writer, content) values(freeboard_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update freeboard set title = #{title}, writer = #{writer}, content = #{content}, updatedate = sysdate where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select count(*) as total from freeboard where title like '%' || #{searchName} || '%' where writer like '%' || #{searchName} || '%' where content like '%' || #{searchName} || '%' where title like '%' || #{searchName} || '%' or content like '%' || #{searchName} || '%' where 1 = 1
